title: canonical QA gate
mission: Create a canonical QA gate document (e.g., runtime/outputs/QA_GATE.md) that converts existing templates/schemas into explicit pass/fail acceptance checks for: DRAFT_REPORT_v0.md, the pilot case study file, METADATA_SCHEMA/JSON Schema validity, citations presence/format, and rights linkage to RIGHTS_LOG.csv. Include a checklist and a machine-actionable section (required paths/filenames).
